name: Truth and Light - Official
description:
GET THE GAME AT :

https://zroxgames.gumroad.com/l/TALOfficial

Truth and light is a massive exploration and puzzle solving game!

[6 hours of length]

Story : You play as a character called Yura, who have the quest to defeat the gods of evil known as the 5 gods : The god of war,of space,of destruction,god of ice and finally the god od death.a

The game is pretty long and unique so hope you enjoy!
